title: #40 Middle Ages
itunes:title: #40 Middle Ages
description:
On this week's podcast, Nate, Aaron, and Brian take a trip back to Medieval Times to learn about the Middle Ages. The guys discuss famous court jesters, learn about unusual medical treatments, and discuss well known phrases that originated from the Middle Ages. 

 

Co-hosts: Brian Bates ( https://www.instagram.com/brianbatescomic) & Aaron Weber ( https://www.instagram.com/realaaronweber)

 

Podcast produced by Nate & Laura Bargatze

Recording & Editing by Genovations Media

https://www.natebargatze.com

https://www.allthingscomedy.com

https://www.genovationsmedia.com

Email - Nateland@NateBargatze.com
